All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Artist
The `Artist` class represents an artist in the virtual art gallery system.
ArtistNotFoundException
The `ArtistNotFoundException` class is a custom exception that is thrown when an artwork is not found.
Artwork
Represents an artwork in the Virtual Art Gallery.
ArtWorkNotFoundException
The ArtWorkNotFoundException class is a custom exception that is thrown when an artwork is not found.
Dbconnection
The DbConnection class provides a utility method to establish a connection to the database.
Gallery
The `Gallery` class represents an art gallery in the Virtual Art Gallery application.
GalleryIdNotFoundException
The `GalleryIdNotFoundException` class is a custom exception that is thrown when a gallery is not found.
IvirtualArtGallery
The IVirtualArtGallery interface outlines the methods that must be implemented by any class aiming to provide functionality for managing a virtual art gallery.
MainModule
The main class for the Virtual Art Gallery application.
User
The `User` class represents a user entity in the virtual art gallery system.
UserNotFoundException
The `UserNotFoundException` class is a custom exception that is thrown when a user is not found.
VirtualArtGallerydao
The `VirtualArtGallerydao` class provides data access functionality for the Virtual Art Gallery system.
VirtualArtGalleryServiceImpl
The `VirtualArtGalleryServiceImpl` class implements the `IVirtualArtGallery` interface and provides the functionality to manage a virtual art gallery.
VirtualArtGalleryTest
The `VirtualArtGalleryTest` class contains JUnit tests for the `VirtualArtGalleryServiceImpl` class to verify the functionality of adding, updating, and removing artworks, as well as creating galleries.
